title: List packages in CRAN incoming queue. — cran_incoming
text: submitting package CRAN, undergoes series checks published publicly available. cran_incoming() allows check packages currently queue, folder located. information help track package submission. following folders considered (approximately order CRAN queue sequence): newbies, inspect, pretest, recheck, pending, waiting, publish. folder archive inspected default. folders named initials CRAN volunteers inspected.

title: List packages in CRAN incoming queue. — cran_incoming
